name: Ferrari F355 Challenge
synopsis: Ferrari F355 Challenge re-creates the complete Ferrari driving experience on the world's fastest racetracks. In five gameplay modes, you can race in popular racing venues around the world. Take on a friend in a split-screen head-to-head race, and then replay the action. Even amateur drivers can get up to speed using the new Assist function to hone their skills step-by-step. The game also features broadcast-style camera angles to further immerse you in the races.
